referral.title: My Referral
referral.instruction: Take part in the Referral Program and earn more! Available for everyone!
referral.instruction.one: Each player has a unique referral link.
referral.instruction.two: Invite others to play on the Coinica and earn rewards when they apply your referral code.
referral.instruction.three: Referral rewards change based on your VIP rank.
referral.code.error.subHeader: This could be one of the following reasons:
referral.code.error.reason.one: Own referral code is being used
referral.code.error.reason.two: Code is from referrer of user
referral.code.error.reason.three: User has already applied a referral code
task.instruction.one: There are different tasks for every game where you need to play a certain amount of games.
task.instruction.two: Check daily, weekly and monthly tasks.
task.instruction.three: You can get VIP points by completing each task.
challenge.title: Daily Challenge
challenge.payout.title: Total payout of the day
ranking.title: Ranking
mj.tutorial.game_flow.title: Game Flow
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p1: Select an amount of cryptocurrency to deposit and begin the game.
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p2: The first standard tile is drawn
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p3: Choose the High/Low/Draw in comparison with the first standard tile and the proceeding face-down tile.
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p4: When a player holds 14 tiles (1st standard tile and 13 drawn tiles) , the player is allowed to self-draw. In case the player completes the structure of hands or to discard 1 tile and to continues to draw new one in case the player doesn’t complete it.
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p5: Until self-drawn, refresh the game or finish drawing all 33 tiles without a completed hand, a player can keep playing the High-low game continue drawing new tiles by purchasing additional credits.
mj.tutorial.game_flow.p6: If a player refreshes the game, finishes drawing 33 tiles, or begins the new game, the first standard tile
mj.tutorial.hilo.title: Hi-lo part
mj.tutorial.hilo.p2: Players need to determine HIGH, LOW or DRAW in comparison with the standard tile. If it's a hit, the player continues high-low game at the winning amount as-is. The player can select a payout to his wallet while continuing to play.
mj.tutorial.hilo.p4: A=136 - First Standard tile(1) - Number of tiles drawn. Compared to the standard tiles. H = Number of “High” tiles left D = Number of “Draw” tiles left. L = Number of “Low” tiles left.
mj.tutorial.hilo.p5: Odds(High) = A/H*0.9 （House Edge:0.1） Odds(Draw)= A/D*0.9 Odds(Low)=A/L*0.9
mj.tutorial.mahjong.title: Mahjong Part
mj.tutorial.mahjong.p1: The player must choose a discard tile when the number of tiles in his hand reaches 14.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.p2: High-low game may be played with up to 34 tiles. (1 standard tile at game start + 33 draw tiles.) If a player can make the following complete structure of a hand with 14 tiles, the player can declare a Self-draw.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.p3: Players are sent a prize according to their self-drawn hand. If the player decides in the middle of the game that he cannot collect a complete structure of hand, he may refresh the game. The own wind advances by one, and the game resets from the beginning. Once the player leaves the game, he can continue in the middle of the game when he logs in again, or he can choose to start a new game..
mj.tutorial.mahjong.hand.title: Mahjong Hand
mj.tutorial.mahjong.hand.p1: Mahjong Hand and points are based on Mahjong Competition Rules (MCR) and arranged for this game.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.hand.p2: See Mahjong Hands page about all Hands and Points that this Mahjong Hi-lo adopts.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.win_point.title: Mahjong Win Point Ranking: conditions and rewards
mj.tutorial.mahjong.win_point.p1: Mahjong Win Point Ranking’s conditions of participation
mj.tutorial.mahjong.win_point.p2: Daily Ranking: Win the mahjong game at least once on the day.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.win_point.p3: Weekly Ranking: Get 10 or more win points total for the week.
mj.tutorial.mahjong.win_point.p4: Monthly Ranking: Get 20 or more win points total for the month.
mj.tutorial.rewards.title: Mahjong Win Point Ranking Rewards
mj.tutorial.rewards.daily.title: Daily Ranking
mj.tutorial.rewards.daily.p1: Rewards are given to the top 10 rankings of the week.
mj.tutorial.rewards.daily.p2: If there is a tie and the rankings are the same, the reward for that rank and the next rank (or next-next rank...) shall be divided equally. (e.g., If there are 3 third-place finishers, the reward to be given to the third, fourth, and fifth places shall be divided into those three players and the next rank is 7th place.
mj.tutorial.rewards.daily.p3: If more than one tie for 10th place occurs, the reward for 10th place will be divided equally among that number of players.
mj.tutorial.rewards.weekly.title: Weekly Ranking
mj.tutorial.rewards.weekly.p1: The top 10% of players ranked for the week will be rewarded.
mj.tutorial.rewards.weekly.p2: In the event of a tie for first place, the reward for the first place will be divided equally among the players.
mj.tutorial.rewards.monthly.title: Monthly Ranking
mj.tutorial.rewards.monthly.p1: The top 10% of players ranked for the month will be rewarded.
mj.tutorial.rewards.monthly.p2: As with Weekly Ranking, if there is a tie for first place, the reward for the first place will be divided equally among the players.
mj.tutorial.rewards.time.daily: Daily: 0:00 to 23:59 pm on Chinese Standard Time
mj.tutorial.rewards.time.weekly: Weekly: 0:00 on Monday to 23:59 on Sunday of the week
mj.tutorial.rewards.time.monthly: Monthly: 0:00 on 1st day to 23:59 on last day of the month

th.game.title: Treasurehunt Game
th.gameplay.found_all_treasure: You have already found all treasures, feel free to withdraw.
th.gameplay.reload_page_message: Please reload the page. The game will automatically continue once reloaded.
th.autoplay.step3.text: Select number of panels to open
th.autoplay.step5.message: Select stop parameters for Autoplay. (You can select multiple conditions.)
th.autoplay.set_order.message: Explore islands with specified order of panels to open
th.autoplay.confirm_to_home: Are you sure you want to go home?
th.autoplay.confirm_to_start: Are you sure you want to proceed?
th.autoplay.stop.param1: Reach maximum number of games played:
th.autoplay.stop.param1.message: Stop autoplay when a certain number of games have been played.
th.autoplay.stop.param2.message: Stop when your token balance has reaches a minimum balance.
th.autoplay.stop.param3.message: Stop when your token balance has reaches a maximum balance.
th.autoplay.notice.message: Notice: there is a degree of risk involved with enabling auto-play.
th.autoplay.ended.sub.stop_params: One of your stop parameter/s have been reached
th.autoplay.ended.num_of_games: The game was ended because your stop parameter 'Number of games' is satisfied
th.autoplay.ended.min_bal: The game was ended because your stop parameter 'Minimum balance' is satisfied
th.autoplay.ended.max_bal: The game was ended because your stop parameter 'Maximum balance' is satisfied
th.autoplay.ended.no_bal: The game was ended because you don't have anymore balance to play
th.autoplay.modal.message: You can try again by pressing Retry button, this will reset all the stop parameters.
th.tutorial.step1: Select a destination. The cost to visit each destination varies from 1 Token to 20 Tokens.
th.tutorial.step2: Select the number of pirates to be your rivals during the treasure hunt. You may select between 1-15 pirates per treasure hunt.
th.tutorial.step3: Continue selecting tiles to find the treasure.
th.tutorial.step4: If you find a treasure, you can keep searching for other treasures on the same map.
th.tutorial.step5: You may withdraw treasure you find during the game.
th.tutorial.step6: If you opened a pirate tile, you lose all the treasure you have earned so far.
gq.tutorial.1: Check number of Ghost to summon and Battle limit setting and to confirm summon.
gq.tutorial.2: After summoning, Ghost will be sent to battle and fight against another Ghost automatically,you can check the battle status in List screen.
gq.tutorial.3: In addition, you can check battle history and battle log in “Details” screen and can add deposit or decide to withdraw earnings and quit from battles.
gq.settings.display_result: Display results of each game outside of the battle screen

vip.how_it_works.title: How it works
vip.how_it_works.list.title: The planned benefit or VIP program:
vip.how_it_works.list.item.first: Cash back on user’s monthly deficit: only if user’s total balance of the month shows deficit.
vip.how_it_works.list.item.third: The right to participate in closed beta test play: The right to participate in closed beta before the new game is released.
vip.how_it_works.list.item.fourth: VIP concierge: Specific services are yet to be determined. It's like a real hotline to the operator.
